title: San Carlos 4bed/2bath house with a playground
map_address: beverly dr near san carlos ave
posting_body: ['Unique 4bdr./2bth home with huge beautifully landscaped backyard and enormous deck.', 'The property is located on an oversized lot with gorgeous views from the top.', 'Walking distance to the best rated schools San Carlos has to offer (Arundel Elementary, San Carlos Charter school, Mariposa Middle and Carlmont High).', 'San Carlos is halfway in between San Francisco and San Jose which offers great flexibility for commuters.', 'The house is a mile away from San Carlos downtown with the world-class restaurants.', 'The backyard has many sitting areas including the one with a fire pit, well maintained lawn, a made-in-Germany playground with 2 swings.', 'Separate office building for remote work/teleconferencing.', 'The house is very well maintained, with new top notch appliances (Bosch and Samsung), and a separate laundry room.', 'One of the bedrooms has a loft space which can be used as a play area for kids or for holding an additional bed.', 'Dining room is furnished with a dining table fitting 4 people.', 'Two bedrooms have direct access to the backyard deck.', 'Spacious driveway for parking.', 'This home can offer a true experience and joy of living in San Carlos upscale neighborhood.', 'Property is surrounded by redwood trees that provide shade and privacy.', 'Abundant native flowers and succulents, apple and pear trees, plums and lots of citrus trees.', 'Home comes unfurnished.', 'Minimum a year lease.', '$5500 monthly, utilities not Included.', 'Occupancy: 4 people max, pets are considered case by case.', 'Weekly gardening service is included, tenants are responsible for all utilities (electricity/gas, water, internet (1Gbps fiber or xfinity), garbage).', 'Do not disturb the current tenants.', 'Features:', '* Double-pane windows', '* Hardwood floors throughout', '* Recently-installed high-end stainless steel appliances', '* Central heating', '* Large, landscaped multi-terraced backyard', '* New Washer&Dryer, separate laundry room', '* Bicycle storage space', '* Second refrigerator', '* Extra storage space', '* Tenant is responsible for all utilities', '* Good credit and income required', '* NO SMOKING of any kind', '* Pets negotiable separately', '1) $35 application fee per applicant', '2) Proof of income: two most recent pay stubs OR new employment letter', '3) copy of your photo ID', 'The house is listed on zillow, here:  bit .', 'ly/3b0NXB4', 'Call/text: six50-530-7171 or email.']
